REQ_BMS_001: If cell temperature exceeds 60°C, the BMS must enter SHUTDOWN state.
REQ_BMS_002: If cell voltage exceeds 4.2V, the BMS must enter OVERVOLTAGE_FAULT state.
REQ_BMS_003: If temperature stays below 60°C, the BMS must stay in COMPLETELY NORMAL state.
REQ_BMS_004: If cell voltage is below 2.5V, the BMS must enter UNDERVOLTAGE state.
